transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Sir Harish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hai sir?
Executive: Ji sir, boliye na.
Customer: Sir actually aapki baat Riya se hui thi, Riya aapke account manager hai sir, theek hai?
Executive: Ji ji, ji ji.
Executive: Toh unhone sir aapko ek additional category ke liye try kiya hua tha sir, toh woh mere paas aayi hui thi. Ki sir isko addition kar sakte hai kya, sir interested hai aur isko proceed karna chahte hai.
Executive: Right sir, environmental consultant aapki additional category hai sir. Isme ki valid aur services use kar rahe hai sir aap.
Customer: [inaudible] na? Main actually kya hai woh aap please chat hamara jo yeh hai na Jyesh karke woh dekhte hai, woh baat karega aapse.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Kya naam hai unka sir?
Customer: Jyesh Deshmukh.
Executive: Jyesh naam hai unka?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Unka number mil jayega sir?
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello ha boliye.
Executive: Ha boliye. Ha Jyesh bhai baat kar raha?
Customer: Ha ha sahi hai.
Executive: Sir Harish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, area ka manager, Riya se baat hui thi sir aapki additional category addition ke liye sir.
Customer: Ha addition matlab hum soch rahe the ki isme hi hum change kar sakte hai kya category abhi turant, abhi jo hai currently jisme.
Executive: Abhi toh sir aap us category mein already use kar rahe hai sir jisme ki aapki services ki requirement hai jaise ki water testing services ho gaya sir.
Customer: Sir jo usme kuch aisa deal aata hi nahi, usme kuch matlab lead bhi aate nahi jyada.
Executive: Nahi dekho
Customer: Isliye hum phir soch rahe the ki usme hi change kar lete hai sir naya lene ke siva.
Executive: Main aapko bata deta hu dekho hota kya hai ki water testing services mein number of supplier jyada hai competition jyada hai.
Executive: Toh usme thoda sa flow of buylead jo hai na sir restricted ho jata hai sir, theek hai? Uske vajah se aapko aisa lag raha hoga but aap agar aap active rahenge na portal pe sir, theek hai? Regular basis se buylead check karenge sir toh bilkul aapko water testing services se related buylead aapko milegi sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh mera suggestion yeh hai ki
Customer: Agar hume change karna ho usko services ko toh kar sakte hai kya usme? Water testing nikal ke dusra koi alag dusra service?
Executive: Bilkul aap kar sakte hai sir aap but wahi hoga sir ki jo category ka flow hai sir inquiry ka flow us category mein water testing services mein woh kam ho jayegi.
Customer: Ha theek hai. Woh phir chalega kyunki kya hai woh aise bhi kuch usme jyada toh ek hazar, do do hazar, do hazar rupaye ki aati hai aati hai toh bhi water testing ka.
Customer: Toh uske vajah se hum uske jagah pe dusra service add kar lete hai sir.
Executive: Aur kaun kaun si category jaise water testing service ho gaya, environmental consulting ho gaya, laboratory testing.
Customer: Ha toh phir woh woh hum aaj discuss karte hai kaun sa add karne ka toh phir kal kal ya phir Monday ko hum schedule karke woh change kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Uska kuch additional charges lagega ya usme hi rehta hai?
Executive: Nahi category change karne ka koi additional charge nahi hai sir. Dekho but mera suggestion yeh hai na sir ki aapke different different category hai jisme ki buylead aap use kar rahe hai. Toh soil testing service mein bhi kaafi business hai sir aur hamare paas inquiry ka flow bhi jyada hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur jaise category aap addition karate hai sir toh aapke paas numbers of buylead jo hai woh bhi badh jata hai.
Executive: Toh mera suggestion hoga sir ki category aap change kar lijiye but ek category aur addition lijiye sir. Soil testing services mein bhi aap le sakte hai sir. Environmental consultant mein already aap interested hai hi sir.
Customer: Ha theek hai main hum discuss karte hai team ke saath toh phir jo kuch yeh rahega woh kal batate hai aapko.
Executive: Water testing lab mein kya hai sir water testing lab mein toh sir bahut abhi demand chal raha hai.
Customer: Ha wohi wohi aur demand hai inquiry toh kuch aati bhi nahi uski aur jo aati hai woh bhi kuch 100 mein matlab hazar, do hazar rupaye aisa kuch matlab.
Executive: Aap Maharashtra region mein sir kaam karte hai sir, theek hai? Agar aap online aayenge na sir toh main aapko dikhaunga bahut supplier hai sir aapke Maharashtra region se soil testing.
Customer: Right right wohi.
Executive: Theek hai? Bahut region hai sir Mumbai Maharashtra region se. Uski vajah se thoda flow hai isliye main keh raha hu ki category addition karwaiye. Category addition mein fayda kya hoga kyunki aapki us category ko hum log promote karenge. Promote karne se saath buylead toh aayegi hi aayegi sir. Aapke paas inquiry bhi aayegi sir.
Customer: Okay ha.
Executive: Water testing services wagera na sir kaafi demanding services hai sir water ka test kisko nahi karwana hai ghar mein aaro hai sir aaro ka jo filter hota hai usko kisko change nahi karwana hota hai sir. Hum log alert toh rehte hai water ko leke sir. Toh mera wahi kehna hai ki sir aap ek addition category kare waha se buylead bhi aapko badhegi aur inquiry bhi badhega sir.
Customer: Ha theek hai theek hai main kal staff team ke saath discuss iske logo ka woh kal aapko batata hu.
Executive: Ji sir. Dusri cheez main puch raha tha sir ki buylead ka consumption itna kam kyun hai sir? Kya reason hai sir?
Customer: Abhi woh filhaal koi matlab jo employee hai hamare woh chutti par hai jo ki dekhte hai IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Woh chutti par hai isliye koi handle karne ke liye nahi hai. Isliye month mein toh
Executive: Aap aap use nahi kar payenge sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm karta hu par jyada time nahi main de sakta.
Executive: Nahi sir main isliye bol raha hu sir agar aap buylead use nahi karenge na sir toh company ki jo listing hai visibility woh down chali jati hai. Cost toh hum receive kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: But
Executive: Buylead use nahi kare toh hamari company Shri Chakrapani ki jo listing hai woh niche ja rahi hai sir, theek hai? Iske vajah se jo flow of inquiry hai woh bhi kam ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Right right.
Executive: Karte hai hum abhi matlab woh kal parso aa jayenge toh phir Monday se jo rahega schedule aur agar add karna ho toh main woh bhi batata hu aapko Monday tak.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir.
Executive: Yeh dekhiye aur category ko add karwaiye sir theek hai? Abhi hum log do saal teen saal ki services complimentary free de rahe hai. Toh kam paise mein jyada services aapko mil jayegi aur waha se inquiry ka flow bhi badh jayega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai kal toh aapko is call ka.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change the category.

- Low buylead consumption.

- Employee is on leave, can't handle IndiaMART work.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of water testing services.

- Executive suggested adding another category.

- Executive informed no additional charges for category change.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with team and inform by Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- category addition, buyleads, water testing, services
